title: The Legend of Trinity
description: Out of PrintA Prince greedy for the throne, a Vampire questing for a legend, a Minister pained by his past, a Princess struck by tragedy, a Loner seeking redemption, a Lady suffering for her faith, a Youngster searching for solace, a Husband struggling with his laziness, and a Master with a mysterious desire! When all their paths collide on a fateful night, nothing will ever be the same!
author: Girish Haridas
